name: firebase-typesense-search-extension
description: Firebase extension that indexes Firestore documents into Typesense

scripts.test: npm run test-part-1 && npm run test-part-2 && npm run test-part-3
scripts.test-part-1: cp -f extensions/test-params-flatten-nested-true.local.env extensions/firestore-typesense-search.env.local && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules DOTENV_CONFIG=extensions/test-params-flatten-nested-true.local.env firebase emulators:exec --only functions,firestore,extensions 'jest --testRegex="WithFlattening" --testRegex="backfill.spec"'
scripts.test-part-2: cp -f extensions/test-params-flatten-nested-false.local.env extensions/firestore-typesense-search.env.local && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules DOTENV_CONFIG=extensions/test-params-flatten-nested-false.local.env firebase emulators:exec --only functions,firestore,extensions 'jest --testRegex="WithoutFlattening"'
